whwollyman010, I only know of one solution to your problem but there might be more. Go to www.slysoft.com and download the program "CloneCD." This is only a trial program, you have it for 21 days before it runs out unless you buy it. Once downloaded and installed, select the Punisher game and burn it to a CD. Once it's done burning remove disk then insert disk back into drive. The installer for The Punisher should pop up and then all you have to do is install game. If The Punisher is too big of a file to burn onto a CD, download CloneDVD from slysoft.com instead and burn the game to a DVD which has much more memory than a CD.

@ smokes231 - You can't use Daemon Tools for this. There is no .iso to mount, nor are there any files that are even compatible with Daemon Tools, and if you try to install directly to a virtual drive, it will give a 'no disc present' prompt. You don't even need a virtual drive, just install & paste cd crack... oh, & stop giving shitty advice. You don't even know what you're talking about.

@ smokes231 - What the fuck are you talking about? You don't need demon tools for this. In fact there are no files in this torrent that are even compatible with daemon tools. You're a douchebag asshole who gives fake advice... People, just click 'setup' in cd1, it will automatically extract cds 2 & 3. Then paste the cd crack into the app folder. Easy peazy. Everything worked fine for me, once I decided to ignore the dumbass... For added pleasure, download the uncensored patch for gore galore.
